subject: no response on Simsonn Tools
description_text:
Hello,

my simsonn pro pedals give no response on the simsonn pedals v4 tool.

in the simsonn manager tool it says old version

what did i have to do ?

best regards Alex

conversations.body_text: Hi Alexander Nübel,  Hello, the version you provided is too outdated. Please download SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0.  You can manually update the firmware by following these steps:  Go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → Select Pedals → Choose the plus.sfu file to upgrade.  Once the update is completed, the issue should be resolved.
Thank you very much. This solved the issue.
